title: ZenML 0.70.0 Released!
description: The latest ZenML release includes **pipeline composition improvements**, **new integrations**, and **enhanced artifact management**. Check out all the new features!

title: Dashboard Performance Improvements
description: We've optimized **data fetching** and rendering throughout the dashboard. Pages now load **up to 2Ã— faster** with reduced memory usage.

title: New Integrations: AWS SageMaker & Vertex AI
description: Deploy your ML pipelines to **AWS SageMaker** and **Google Vertex AI** with our new integrations. Full support for training and inference.

title: Enhanced Artifact Visualization
description: View your model outputs, datasets, and metrics with our new **interactive visualizations**. Supports Pandas DataFrames, images, and custom visualizers.

title: Python 3.8 Support Ending Soon
description: Python 3.8 reaches end-of-life in October 2024. **ZenML 1.0 will require Python 3.9+**. Please upgrade your environments.

title: Fixed Artifact Caching Bug
description: Resolved an issue where cached artifacts could be incorrectly reused after parameter changes. All cache keys now properly reflect configuration.
